divs: Sighting DetailsI was smoking a ciggerette outside and happened to see a bright starlike light abover the trees. (I live in a ver populated neighborhood). It was very late maybe early morning. i watched the light bob up an down then movie in a circular motion virtically. i herd a noise behind my house so i ran inside haha. i looked at the clock and it was 3:35am exactly eastern time. My windows were open and i could swear i could hear noices outside in the sky... jets flew by soon after. I live in East Providence, Rhode Island so its very busy.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in East Providence
There were no other sightings in East Providence on or around August 23rd 2012
Summary: Light hovered and "bobbed" up and down and side to side. Very unusual.
